text:
@DanRather I guess the spike in covid-19 cases were mostly from the thousands of protesters across the country over the last few weeks, since President Trump's rally hasn't happened yet. Why haven't the news media reported this?
Oh, that's not part of your agenda Dan Rather. Is it?
